info.title: Customer Credit API
info.description:
This documentation describes the available REST APIs for VTEX Customer Credit.

With Customer Credit you can enable credit payments on the Smartcheckout of your store, besides controlling invoices and your clients credit limits.
[Learn more about this at Help Center](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/credit-control-overview)



All requests need the authorization header.

This API allow two kinds of authorization:
1. Authorization header containing the VTEX Id authentication token 
2. VTEX Appkey and Apptoken headers

accountName.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL

environment.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL.

get.description: Returns all invoices according to the informed query params in the request.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The Media type of the body of the request. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Media type(s) that is/are acceptable for the response. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Invoice's value. It must be completed with a decimal value.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Invoice's status. It must be completed with "Paid", "Cancelled" or "Open" value.

parameters.name: friendlyId
parameters.description: Invoice's identifier

parameters.name: creditAccountId
parameters.description: Credit account's identifier

get.description: Returns associated data for the specified Invoice Id, like status  and value, for example.

parameters.description: The Media type of the body of the request. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json

parameters.name: creditAccountId
parameters.description: Credit account's identification
